name: Food Supply Chain Guaranteed Loan Program
objective: The Food Supply Chain Guaranteed Loan Program will make loan guarantees to lenders to facilitate financing to qualified borrowers and projects for the start-up or expansion of activities in the middle of the food supply chain, particularly the aggregation, processing, manufacturing, storage, transportation, wholesaling, or distribution of food.
assistance_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: There were 38 closed FSC-guaranteed loan totaling $379.3 million.
